00043 /**
00044  * @brief  A class for managing one, two, or three dimensional arrays of primitive data types.
00045  *
00046  */
00047 template<class TYPE, typename SIZE = int> class AffxMultiDimensionalArray
00048 {
00049 private:
00050     TYPE* m_ar;
00051     SIZE m_iXDimension;
00052     SIZE m_iYDimension;
00053     SIZE m_iZDimension;
00054 
00055     // to make nth_element() calls look nicer
00056     TYPE* begin() { return m_ar; }
00057     TYPE* end() { return m_ar + m_iXDimension; }
00058 
00059 public:
00060     static double infinity;
00061     TYPE* getPointer() {mustBeVector(); return m_ar;}
00062     SIZE getXDimension() {return m_iXDimension;}
00063     SIZE getYDimension() {return m_iYDimension;}
00064     SIZE getZDimension() {return m_iZDimension;}
00065     void convertMatrixToVector() {m_iXDimension = m_iXDimension * m_iYDimension; m_iYDimension = 1;}
00066 
00067     SIZE length() {return m_iXDimension;}
00068     bool isVector() {return ((m_iXDimension > 0) && (m_iYDimension == 1) && (m_iZDimension == 1));}
00069     bool isMatrix() {return ((m_iXDimension > 0) && (m_iYDimension > 1) && (m_iZDimension == 1));}
00070 
00071     void increment(SIZE x) {m_ar[x]++;}
00072 
00073     AffxMultiDimensionalArray()
00074     {
00075         m_iXDimension = 1;
00076         m_iYDimension = 1;
00077         m_iZDimension = 1;
00078         m_ar = new TYPE[getCount()];
00079         if (m_ar == NULL) {Err::errAbort("Run is out of memory.");}
00080         initialize();
00081     }

00114     {

00116         m_iYDimension = that.m_iYDimension;
00117         m_iZDimension = that.m_iZDimension;
00118         m_ar = new TYPE[getCount()];
00119         if (m_ar == NULL) {Err::errAbort("Run is out of memory.");}
00120         memcpy(m_ar, that.m_ar, (getCount() * sizeof(TYPE)));
00121     }

00167     const AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE>& operator=(AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE>& that)
00168     {
00169         if (this == &that) return that;
00170         if (m_ar != 0)
00171         {
00172             delete[] m_ar;
00173             m_ar = 0;
00174         }
00175         m_iXDimension = that.m_iXDimension;
00176         m_iYDimension = that.m_iYDimension;
00177         m_iZDimension = that.m_iZDimension;
00178         m_ar = new TYPE[getCount()];
00179         if (m_ar == NULL) {Err::errAbort("Run is out of memory.");}
00180         memcpy(m_ar, that.m_ar, (getCount() * sizeof(TYPE)));
00181         return *this;
00182     }

00195             m_iXDimension = 0;

00201     static void defineInfinity()
00202     {
00203         double d1 = 1.0;
00204         double d2 = 0.0;
00205         infinity = (d1 / d2);
00206     }
00207 
00208     bool isAllInfinity()
00209     {
00210         bool b = true;
00211         for (SIZE iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00212         {
00213             if (get(iIndex) != infinity)
00214             {
00215                 b = false;
00216                 break;
00217             }
00218         }
00219         return b;
00220     }

00222     SIZE getCount()
00223     {
00224         return (m_iXDimension * m_iYDimension * m_iZDimension);
00225     }

00227     SIZE compareTo(AffxMultiDimensionalArray& that)
00228     {
00229         SIZE iResult = 0;
00230         SIZE iLength = min(getCount(), that.getCount());
00231 
00232         bool bEqual = true;
00233         for (SIZE iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iLength); iIndex++)
00234         {
00235             if (m_ar[iIndex] != that.m_ar[iIndex])
00236             {
00237                 bEqual = false;
00238                 iResult = (m_ar[iIndex] - that.m_ar[iIndex]);
00239                 break;
00240             }
00241         }
00242         if (bEqual) {iResult = (getCount() - that.getCount());}
00243 
00244         return iResult;
00245     }
00246 
00247     bool equals(AffxMultiDimensionalArray& that)
00248     {
00249         bool bEquals = false;
00250         if (getCount() == that.getCount())
00251         {
00252             for (SIZE i = 0; (i < getCount()); i++)
00253             {
00254                 bEquals = true;
00255                 if (m_ar[i] != that.m_ar[i])
00256                 {
00257                     bEquals = false;
00258                     break;
00259                 }
00260             }
00261         }
00262         return bEquals;
00263     }

00265     void initialize()
00266     {
00267         memset(m_ar, 0, getCount() * sizeof(TYPE));
00268     }
00269     void set_unchecked(SIZE x, TYPE t)
00270     {
00271         m_ar[x] = t;
00272     }
00273     void set(SIZE x, TYPE t)
00274     {
00275         SIZE iIndex = x;
00276         if ((iIndex < 0) || (iIndex >= getCount())) {Err::errAbort("AffxMultiDimensionalArray::set(x, TYPE) index out of bounds. " + ::getInt(x));}
00277         m_ar[iIndex] = t;
00278     }
00279     void* getPointer(SIZE x)
00280     {
00281         SIZE iIndex = x;
00282         if ((iIndex < 0) || (iIndex >= getCount())) {Err::errAbort("AffxMultiDimensionalArray::getPointer(x) index out of bounds. " + ::getInt(x));}
00283         return &m_ar[x];
00284     }
00285     void set(SIZE x, SIZE y, TYPE t)
00286     {
00287         SIZE iIndex = ((x * m_iYDimension) + y);
00288         if ((iIndex < 0) || (iIndex >= getCount())) {Err::errAbort("AffxMultiDimensionalArray::set(x, y, TYPE) index out of bounds. " + ::getInt(x) + ", " + ::getInt(y));}
00289         m_ar[iIndex] = t;
00290     }
00291     void* getPointer(SIZE x, SIZE y)
00292     {
00293         SIZE iIndex = ((x * m_iYDimension) + y);
00294         if ((iIndex < 0) || (iIndex >= getCount())) {Err::errAbort("AffxMultiDimensionalArray::getPointer(x, y) index out of bounds. " + ::getInt(x) + ", " + ::getInt(y));}
00295         return &m_ar[iIndex];
00296     }
00297     void set(SIZE x, SIZE y, SIZE z, TYPE t)
00298     {
00299         SIZE iIndex = ((x * m_iYDimension * m_iZDimension) + (y * m_iZDimension) + z);
00300         if ((iIndex < 0) || (iIndex >= getCount())) {Err::errAbort("AffxMultiDimensionalArray::set(x, y, z, TYPE) index out of bounds. " + ::getInt(x) + ", " + ::getInt(y) + ", " + ::getInt(z));}
00301         m_ar[iIndex] = t;
00302     }

00304     {
00305         SIZE iIndex = x;
00306         if ((iIndex < 0) || (iIndex >= getCount())) {Err::errAbort("AffxMultiDimensionalArray::get(x) index out of bounds. " + ::getInt(x));}
00307         return m_ar[iIndex];
00308     }

00318     }

00320     {

00322         if ((iIndex < 0) || (iIndex >= getCount())) {Err::errAbort("AffxMultiDimensionalArray::get(x, y, z) index out of bounds. " + ::getInt(x) + ", " + ::getInt(y) + ", " + ::getInt(z));}
00323         return m_ar[iIndex];

00326     void mustBeVector()
00327     {
00328         if (!isVector())
00329         {
00330 //            AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector."));
00331         }
00332     }
00333 
00334     void insertAt(SIZE x, TYPE t)
00335     {
00336         mustBeVector();
00337         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> arTemp(*this);
00338         if (m_ar != 0)
00339         {
00340             delete[] m_ar;
00341             m_ar = 0;
00342         }
00343         m_iXDimension++;
00344         m_ar = new TYPE[getCount()];
00345         if (m_ar == NULL) {Err::errAbort("Run is out of memory.");}
00346         initialize();
00347         if (x > 0) {memcpy(m_ar, arTemp.getPointer(), (x * sizeof(TYPE)));}
00348         memcpy((m_ar + x), &t, sizeof(TYPE));
00349         if (x < arTemp.length()) {memcpy((m_ar + x + 1), (arTemp.getPointer() + x), ((arTemp.length() - x) * sizeof(TYPE)));}
00350     }
00351 
00352     void removeAt(SIZE x)
00353     {
00354         if (length() < 1) return;
00355         mustBeVector();
00356         if (x < (length() - 1))
00357         {
00358             memmove((m_ar + x), (m_ar + x + 1), ((m_iXDimension - x - 1) * sizeof(TYPE)));
00359         }
00360         m_iXDimension--;
00361     }
00362 
00363     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> unique()
00364     {
00365         mustBeVector();
00366         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> ar(*this);
00367         for (SIZE iIndex = 1; (iIndex < ar.length()); iIndex++)
00368         {
00369             for (SIZE iIndex2 = 0; (iIndex2 < iIndex); iIndex2++)
00370             {
00371                 if (ar.get(iIndex) == ar.get(iIndex2))
00372                 {
00373                     ar.removeAt(iIndex);
00374                     iIndex--;
00375                     break;
00376                 }
00377             }
00378         }
00379         return ar;
00380     }
00381 
00382     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> diff()
00383     {
00384         mustBeVector();
00385 //        if (length() < 2) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function diff(int) must operate on a vector with more than one element in it."));}
00386         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> ar(this->m_iXDimension - 1);
00387         for (SIZE iIndex = 1; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00388         {
00389             ar.set((iIndex - 1), get(iIndex) - get(iIndex - 1));
00390         }
00391         return ar;
00392     }
00393 
00394     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> rev()
00395     {
00396         mustBeVector();
00397         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> ar(this->length());
00398         for (SIZE iIndex = (length() - 1); (iIndex >= 0); iIndex--)
00399         {
00400             ar.set(((length() - 1) - iIndex), get(iIndex));
00401         }
00402         return ar;
00403     }
00404 
00405     void calculatePointEstimates(double& dPointEstimate, double& dPointEstimateLower, double& dPointEstimateUpper)
00406     {
00407         if (nonZeroLength() == 0) {dPointEstimate = 0.0; dPointEstimateLower = 0.0; dPointEstimateUpper = 0.0; return;}
00408         if (mean() == 0.0) {dPointEstimate = 0.0; dPointEstimateLower = 0.0; dPointEstimateUpper = 0.0; return;}
00409         else if (round(mean(), 4) == 1.0) {dPointEstimate = 1.0; dPointEstimateLower = 1.0; dPointEstimateUpper = 1.0; return;}
00410         else
00411         {
00412             AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE> ar(length());
00413             for (SIZE iIndex = 0; (iIndex < ar.length()); iIndex++)
00414             {
00415                 double d = get(iIndex);
00416                 if (d == 0.0) {d = d + 0.0001;}
00417                 if (d == 1.0) {d = d - 0.0001;}
00418                 ar.set(iIndex, log(d/(1-d)));
00419             }
00420             double dMean = ar.mean();
00421             double dSd = ar.sd();
00422             double dMeanUpper = dMean+2*dSd/sqrt((double)ar.length());
00423             double dMeanLower = dMean-2*dSd/sqrt((double)ar.length());
00424 
00425             dPointEstimateUpper = exp(dMeanUpper)/(1+exp(dMeanUpper));
00426             dPointEstimate = exp(dMean)/(1+exp(dMean));
00427             dPointEstimateLower = exp(dMeanLower)/(1+exp(dMeanLower));
00428         }
00429     }
00430 
00431     SIZE nonZeroLength()
00432     {
00433         SIZE iCount = 0;
00434         for (SIZE iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00435         {
00436             if (get(iIndex) != 0.0) {iCount++;}
00437         }
00438         return iCount;
00439     }
00440 
00441     double mean()
00442     {
00443         double dMean = 0.0;
00444         mustBeVector();
00445         if (length() > 0)
00446         {
00447             double dSum = 0.0;
00448             for (SIZE iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00449             {
00450                 dSum += get(iIndex);
00451             }
00452             dMean = dSum / (double)length();
00453         }
00454         return dMean;
00455     }
00456 
00457     double mean(SIZE iLength)
00458     {
00459         double dMean = 0.0;
00460         mustBeVector();
00461         if (iLength > 0)
00462         {
00463             double dSum = 0.0;
00464             for (SIZE iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iLength); iIndex++)
00465             {
00466                 dSum += get(iIndex);
00467             }
00468             dMean = dSum / (double)iLength;
00469         }
00470         return dMean;
00471     }
00472 
00473     void logMean(bool bXDimension, bool bYDimension, AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE>& vect)
00474     {
00475         vect.initialize();
00476         if ((!bXDimension) && (!bYDimension)) {return;}
00477 //        if ((bXDimension) && (bYDimension)) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector."));}
00478         if (bXDimension)
00479         {
00480 //            if (vect.length() != m_iXDimension) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector of the appropriate size."));}
00481             for (SIZE iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00482             {
00483                 for (SIZE iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00484                 {
00485                     vect.set(iXIndex, (TYPE)(vect.get(iXIndex) + log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex))));
00486                 }
00487             }
00488             for (SIZE iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00489             {
00490                 vect.set(iXIndex, (vect.get(iXIndex) / m_iYDimension));
00491             }
00492         }
00493         else if (bYDimension)
00494         {
00495 //            if (vect.length() != m_iYDimension) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector of the appropriate size."));}
00496             for (SIZE iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00497             {
00498                 for (SIZE iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00499                 {
00500                     vect.set(iYIndex, (TYPE)(vect.get(iYIndex) + log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex))));
00501                 }
00502             }
00503             for (SIZE iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00504             {
00505                 vect.set(iYIndex, (vect.get(iYIndex) / m_iXDimension));
00506             }
00507         }
00508     }
00509 
00510     void logVar(bool bXDimension, bool bYDimension, AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE>& vectMeans, AffxMultiDimensionalArray<TYPE>& vectVariances)
00511     {
00512         vectMeans.initialize();
00513         vectVariances.initialize();
00514         if ((!bXDimension) && (!bYDimension)) {return;}
00515 //        if ((bXDimension) && (bYDimension)) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector."));}
00516         if (bXDimension)
00517         {
00518 //            if (vectMeans.length() != m_iXDimension) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector of the appropriate size."));}
00519 //            if (vectVariances.length() != m_iXDimension) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector of the appropriate size."));}
00520             // Calculate Means.
00521             for (SIZE iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00522             {
00523                 for (SIZE iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00524                 {
00525                     vectMeans.set(iXIndex, (TYPE)(vectMeans.get(iXIndex) + log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex))));
00526                 }
00527             }
00528             for (SIZE iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00529             {
00530                 vectMeans.set(iXIndex, (vectMeans.get(iXIndex) / m_iYDimension));
00531             }
00532             // Calculate variances.
00533             for (SIZE iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00534             {
00535                 for (SIZE iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00536                 {
00537                     vectVariances.set(iXIndex, (TYPE)(vectVariances.get(iXIndex) + ((log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex)) - vectMeans.get(iXIndex)) * (log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex)) - vectMeans.get(iXIndex)))));
00538                 }
00539             }
00540             for (SIZE iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00541             {
00542                 vectVariances.set(iXIndex, (vectVariances.get(iXIndex) / (m_iYDimension - 1)));
00543             }
00544         }
00545         else if (bYDimension)
00546         {
00547 //            if (vectMeans.length() != m_iYDimension) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector of the appropriate size."));}
00548 //            if (vectVariances.length() != m_iYDimension) {AffxLog::throwable(new Exception("AffxMultidimensionalArray function must operate on a vector of the appropriate size."));}
00549             // Calculate Means.
00550             for (SIZE iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00551             {
00552                 for (SIZE iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00553                 {
00554                     vectMeans.set(iYIndex, (TYPE)(vectMeans.get(iYIndex) + log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex))));
00555                 }
00556             }
00557             for (SIZE iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00558             {
00559                 vectMeans.set(iYIndex, (vectMeans.get(iYIndex) / m_iXDimension));
00560             }
00561             // Calculate variances.
00562             for (SIZE iXIndex = 0; (iXIndex < m_iXDimension); iXIndex++)
00563             {
00564                 for (SIZE iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00565                 {
00566                     vectVariances.set(iYIndex, (TYPE)(vectVariances.get(iYIndex) + ((log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex)) - vectMeans.get(iYIndex)) * (log(get(iXIndex, iYIndex)) - vectMeans.get(iYIndex)))));
00567                 }
00568             }
00569             for (SIZE iYIndex = 0; (iYIndex < m_iYDimension); iYIndex++)
00570             {
00571                 vectVariances.set(iYIndex, (vectVariances.get(iYIndex) / (m_iXDimension - 1)));
00572             }
00573         }
00574     }
00575 
00576     double nonZeroMean()
00577     {
00578         double dMean = 0.0;
00579         mustBeVector();
00580         if (length() > 0)
00581         {
00582             double dSum = 0.0;
00583             SIZE iCount = 0;
00584             for (SIZE iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00585             {
00586                 if (get(iIndex) != 0)
00587                 {
00588                     dSum += get(iIndex);
00589                     iCount++;
00590                 }
00591             }
00592             if (iCount == 0) {dMean = 0.0;} else {dMean = dSum / (double)iCount;}
00593         }
00594         return dMean;
00595     }

00597     double sd()
00598     {
00599         double dStandardDeviation = 0.0;
00600         double dMean = mean();
00601         mustBeVector();
00602         if (length() > 1)
00603         {
00604             double dSumOfSquares = 0.0;
00605             for (SIZE iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00606             {
00607                 dSumOfSquares += ((get(iIndex) - dMean) * (get(iIndex) - dMean));
00608             }
00609             dStandardDeviation = sqrt(dSumOfSquares / (length() - 1));
00610         }
00611         return dStandardDeviation;
00612     }

00620         {
00621             double dSumOfSquares = 0.0;
00622             for (SIZE iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00623             {
00624                 dSumOfSquares += ((get(iIndex) - dMean) * (get(iIndex) - dMean));
00625             }
00626             dVariance = dSumOfSquares / (length() - 1);

00631     double var(SIZE iLength)
00632     {
00633         double dVariance = 0.0;
00634         double dMean = mean(iLength);
00635         mustBeVector();
00636         if (iLength > 1)
00637         {
00638             double dSumOfSquares = 0.0;
00639             for (SIZE iIndex = 0; iIndex < iLength; iIndex++)
00640             {
00641                 dSumOfSquares += ((get(iIndex) - dMean) * (get(iIndex) - dMean));
00642             }
00643             dVariance = dSumOfSquares / (iLength - 1);
00644         }
00645         return dVariance;

00649     double corr()
00650     {
00651         if (getYDimension() != 2 ) {return std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
00652         SIZE iLength = getXDimension();
00653         double dSum = 0;
00654         for (SIZE iElementIndex = 0; (iElementIndex < iLength); iElementIndex++)
00655         {
00656             dSum += get(iElementIndex, 0);
00657         }
00658         double m1 = (dSum / (double)iLength);
00659         dSum = 0;
00660         for (SIZE iElementIndex = 0; (iElementIndex < iLength); iElementIndex++)
00661         {
00662             dSum += get(iElementIndex, 1);
00663         }
00664         double m2 = (dSum / (double)iLength);
00665         double dNumerator = 0;
00666         double d1 = 0;;
00667         double d2 = 0;
00668         for (SIZE iElementIndex = 0; (iElementIndex < iLength); iElementIndex++)
00669         {
00670             dNumerator += (get(iElementIndex, 0) - m1) * (get(iElementIndex, 1) - m2);
00671             d1 += (get(iElementIndex, 0) - m1) * (get(iElementIndex, 0) - m1) ;
00672             d2 += (get(iElementIndex, 1) - m2) * (get(iElementIndex, 1) - m2) ;
00673         }
00674 //        double dDenominator = sqrt(d1 * d2);
00675         return dNumerator / sqrt(d1) / sqrt(d2);
00676     }

00681         for (SIZE iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00682         {
00683             TYPE t = get(iIndex);
00684             SIZE x = 0;
00685         }
00686     }
00687 
00688     void quickSort() {mustBeVector(); quickSort(0, (length() - 1), 0);}
00689     void quickSort(SIZE iFrom, SIZE iTo, SIZE iCompareCode)
00690     {
00691         if ((m_ar != NULL) && (length() >= 2))
00692         {
00693             TYPE objCenter = 0;
00694             SIZE i = iFrom;
00695             SIZE j = iTo;
00696             objCenter = get((iFrom + iTo) / 2);
00697             do
00698             {
00699                 while ((i < iTo) && (objCenter > get(i))) i++;
00700                 while ((j > iFrom) && (objCenter < get(j))) j--;
00701                 if (i < j) {swap(i, j);}
00702                 if (i <= j)
00703                 {
00704                     i++;
00705                     j--;
00706                 }
00707             } while (i <= j);
00708 
00709             if (iFrom < j) {quickSort(iFrom, j, iCompareCode);}
00710             if (i < iTo) {quickSort(i, iTo, iCompareCode);}
00711             objCenter = 0;
00712         }
00713     }
00714 
00715     void swap(SIZE iIndex1, SIZE iIndex2)
00716     {
00717         TYPE temp = get(iIndex1);
00718         set(iIndex1, get(iIndex2));
00719         set(iIndex2, temp);
00720     }

00722     double percentile(double dPercentile, bool bSort = true)
00723     {
00724         if (length() == 0) {return numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
00725         double d = 0.0;
00726         mustBeVector();
00727         if (bSort) {quickSort();}
00728         double dIndex = ((length() - 1) * dPercentile);
00729         double dMultiplier = dIndex - floor(dIndex);
00730         d = get((int)floor(dIndex)) + ((get((int)ceil(dIndex)) - get((int)floor(dIndex))) * dMultiplier);
00731         return d;
00732     }
00733 
00734     double percentile(double dPercentile, SIZE iLength, bool bSort = true)
00735     {
00736         if (iLength == 0) {return numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
00737         double d = 0.0;
00738         mustBeVector();
00739         if (bSort) {quickSort(0, (iLength - 1), 0);}
00740         double dIndex = ((iLength - 1) * dPercentile);
00741         double dMultiplier = dIndex - floor(dIndex);
00742         d = get((int)floor(dIndex)) + ((get((int)ceil(dIndex)) - get((int)floor(dIndex))) * dMultiplier);
00743         return d;
00744     }

00746     double finiteMedian()
00747     {
00748         mustBeVector();
00749                 vector<double> finiteNumbers;
00750                 for(SIZE i = 0; i < this->length(); i++)
00751                 {
00752                   double d = (double) get(i);
00753                   if(Util::isFinite(d))
00754                   {
00755                     finiteNumbers.push_back(d);
00756                   }
00757                 }
00758                 if (finiteNumbers.empty()) {return numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
00759                 double med = median_in_place(finiteNumbers.begin(),finiteNumbers.end());
00760                 return med;
00761         }

00764     TYPE  median()
00765     {
00766         if (length() == 0) {return numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
00767         TYPE d = 0.0;
00768         mustBeVector();
00769 
00770         std::vector<TYPE> vNonNanVector;
00771         typename std::vector<TYPE>::iterator iter; 
00772 
00773         for(int iIndex=0; iIndex <length(); iIndex++)
00774         {
00775             if(get_unchecked(iIndex) == get_unchecked(iIndex))
00776             {
00777                 vNonNanVector.push_back(get(iIndex)); 
00778             }  
00779         }
00780 
00781         int length = vNonNanVector.size();
00782         if(length == 0)
00783         {
00784             return numeric_limits<TYPE>::quiet_NaN();
00785         }
00786         if (length % 2 == 0) {
00787             iter = vNonNanVector.begin() + ((int)floor((double)length / 2.0) - 1);
00788             std::nth_element(vNonNanVector.begin(), iter, vNonNanVector.end());
00789             std::nth_element(iter, iter + 1, vNonNanVector.end());
00790             d = *iter + (*(iter + 1) - *iter)/2.0; 
00791         }
00792         else {
00793             iter = vNonNanVector.begin() + (int)floor((double)length / 2.0);
00794             std::nth_element(vNonNanVector.begin(), iter, vNonNanVector.end());
00795             d = *iter;                   
00796         }
00797         return d;
00798     }
00799 
00800     TYPE  median(SIZE iLength)
00801     {
00802         if (iLength == 0) {return numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
00803         TYPE d = 0.0;
00804         mustBeVector();
00805 
00806         std::vector<TYPE> vNonNanVector;
00807         typename std::vector<TYPE>::iterator iter;
00808 
00809         for(int iIndex=0; iIndex <iLength; iIndex++)
00810         {
00811             if(get(iIndex) == get(iIndex))
00812             {
00813                 vNonNanVector.push_back(get(iIndex));
00814             }
00815         }
00816 
00817         int iLocalLength = vNonNanVector.size();
00818 
00819         if(iLocalLength == 0)
00820         {
00821             return numeric_limits<TYPE>::quiet_NaN();
00822         }
00823         if ((iLocalLength % 2) == 0) {
00824             iter = vNonNanVector.begin() + ((int)floor((double)iLocalLength / 2.0) - 1);
00825             std::nth_element(vNonNanVector.begin(), iter, vNonNanVector.begin() + iLocalLength);
00826             std::nth_element(iter, iter + 1, vNonNanVector.begin() + iLocalLength);
00827             d = *iter + (*(iter + 1) - *iter)/2.0; 
00828         }
00829         else {
00830             iter = vNonNanVector.begin() + (int)floor((double)iLocalLength / 2.0);
00831             std::nth_element(vNonNanVector.begin(), iter, vNonNanVector.begin() + iLocalLength);
00832             d = *iter;                  
00833         }
00834         return d;
00835     }

00845     bool readVector(const AffxString& strFileName, bool bHeader)
00846     {
00847         try {
00848           affx::TsvFile tsv;
00849           SIZE iCount = 0;
00850           std::string col;
00851           tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00852           tsv.m_optHasColumnHeader = bHeader;
00853           tsv.m_optAutoColumns = !bHeader;
00854           if (tsv.open(strFileName) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00855             while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00856               tsv.get(0,0,col);
00857               set(iCount, AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble());
00858               iCount++;
00859             }
00860             tsv.clear();
00861           } else {return false;}
00862           return true;
00863         } catch(...) {return false;}
00864     }

00875     static SIZE readMatrixXSize(const AffxString& strFileName, bool bRowHeader)
00876     {
00877       affx::TsvFile tsv;
00878       SIZE iCount = 0;
00879       if (tsv.openTable(strFileName) == affx::TSV_OK)    {
00880         tsv.nextLevel(0);
00881         iCount = tsv.getColumnCount(0);
00882         if (bRowHeader) {iCount--;}
00883         tsv.clear();
00884       } else {return 0;}
00885       return iCount;
00886     }

00888     bool readMatrixXHeader(const AffxString& strFileName, bool bRowHeader, AffxArray<AffxString>& ar)
00889     {
00890         ar.deleteAll();
00891         affx::TsvFile tsv;
00892         std::string cname;
00893         SIZE iCount =  bRowHeader ? 1 : 0;
00894         tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00895         tsv.m_optAbortOnError = false;
00896         if (tsv.open(strFileName) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00897           for ( ; iCount < tsv.getColumnCount(0); iCount++ ) {
00898             if ( tsv.cidx2cname(0, iCount, cname) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00899               ar.add(new AffxString(cname));
00900             }
00901           }
00902           tsv.clear();
00903         } else {return false;}
00904         return true;
00905     }

00928     bool readMatrix(const AffxString& strFileName, bool bColHeader, bool bRowHeader, SIZE iColumnCount) {
00929       try {
00930         affx::TsvFile tsv;
00931         tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00932         tsv.m_optAbortOnError = true;
00933         tsv.m_optHasColumnHeader = bColHeader;
00934         tsv.m_optAutoColumns = !bColHeader;
00935         SIZE iCount = 0;
00936         if (bRowHeader) {iColumnCount++;}
00937         
00938         if (tsv.open(strFileName) ==  affx::TSV_OK) {
00939           while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00940             SIZE iColumnNumber = bRowHeader ? 1 : 0;
00941             SIZE iColIndex = 0;
00942             std::string col;
00943             for (; (iColumnNumber < iColumnCount); iColumnNumber++, iColIndex++) {
00944               tsv.get(0,iColumnNumber,  col);
00945               set(iColIndex, iCount, AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble());
00946             }
00947             iCount++;
00948           }
00949           tsv.clear();
00950         } else {return false;}
00951         return true;
00952         } catch(...) {return false;}
00953     }
00954 
00955     SIZE binarySearch(TYPE& obj)
00956     {
00957         SIZE iSearchIndex = -1;
00958         SIZE iLow = 0;
00959         SIZE iHigh = m_iXDimension - 1;
00960         SIZE iMid = 0;
00961         SIZE iCompareResult = 0;
00962 
00963         while (iLow <= iHigh)
00964         {
00965             iMid = (iLow + iHigh) / 2;
00966             iCompareResult = AffxArray<TYPE>::compare(obj, get(iMid));
00967             if (iCompareResult < 0)
00968             {
00969                 iHigh = iMid - 1;
00970             }
00971             else if (iCompareResult > 0)
00972             {
00973                 iLow = iMid + 1;
00974             }
00975             else
00976             {
00977                 iSearchIndex = iMid;
00978                 break;
00979             }
00980         }
00981 
00982         return iSearchIndex;
00983     }
00984 
00985     SIZE binarySearch(TYPE obj, unsigned int& uiLowIndex, unsigned int& uiHighIndex)
00986     {
00987         SIZE iSearchIndex = -1;
00988         if (obj < get(0)) {uiLowIndex = uiHighIndex = 0; return -1;}
00989         if (obj > get(m_iXDimension - 1)) {uiLowIndex = uiHighIndex = (m_iXDimension + 1); return -1;}
00990 
00991         SIZE iMid = 0;
00992         SIZE iLow = 0;
00993         SIZE iHigh = m_iXDimension - 1;
00994         SIZE iCompareResult = 0;
00995 
00996         while (iLow <= iHigh)
00997         {
00998             iMid = (iLow + iHigh) / 2;
00999             iCompareResult = AffxArray<TYPE>::compare(obj, get(iMid));
01000             if (iCompareResult < 0)
01001             {
01002                 iHigh = iMid - 1;
01003             }
01004             else if (iCompareResult > 0)
01005             {
01006                 iLow = iMid + 1;
01007             }
01008             else
01009             {
01010                 iSearchIndex = iMid;
01011                 break;
01012             }
01013         }
01014         // Set boundries where get(uiLowIndex) <= n <=  get(uiHighIndex)
01015         uiLowIndex = uiHighIndex = iMid;
01016         if (get(uiLowIndex) == obj)
01017         {
01018             while ((uiLowIndex > 0) && (get(uiLowIndex - 1) == obj)) {uiLowIndex--;}
01019             while ((uiHighIndex < (m_iXDimension - 1)) && (obj == get(uiHighIndex + 1))) {uiHighIndex++;}
01020         }
01021         else
01022         {
01023             while ((uiLowIndex > 0) && (get(uiLowIndex) > obj)) {uiLowIndex--;}
01024             while ((uiHighIndex < (m_iXDimension - 1)) && (obj > get(uiHighIndex))) {uiHighIndex++;}
01025         }
01026 
01027         return iSearchIndex;
01028     }
01029 
01030     double regress()
01031     {
01032         double dSlope = 0;
01033         double dIntercept = 0;
01034         double dXCoefficient = 0;
01035         double dSumX = 0.0;
01036         double dSumXsq = 0.0;
01037         double dSumY = 0.0;
01038         double dSumYsq = 0.0;
01039         double dSumXY = 0.0;
01040         double dMaxX = -99999;
01041         double dMaxY = -99999;
01042         double x = 0.0;
01043         double y = 0.0;
01044         double xSq = 0.0;
01045         double ySq = 0.0;
01046 
01047         for(SIZE i = 0; (i < getXDimension()); ++i)
01048         {
01049             x = get(i, 0);
01050             y = get(i, 1);
01051             xSq = x * x;
01052             ySq = y * y;
01053             dSumX += x;
01054             dSumXsq += xSq;
01055             dSumY += y;
01056             dSumYsq += ySq;
01057             dSumXY += (x * y);
01058             dMaxX = Max(x, dMaxX);
01059             dMaxY = Max(y, dMaxY);
01060         }
01061         double dSlopeNumerator = 0.0;
01062         double dSlopeDenomenator = 0.0;
01063 
01064         dSlopeNumerator = (getXDimension() * dSumXY) - (dSumX * dSumY);
01065         dSlopeDenomenator = (getXDimension() * dSumXsq) - (dSumX * dSumX);
01066 
01067         if ((dSlopeDenomenator <= 0) || (getXDimension() <= 2))
01068         {
01069             return numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();
01070         }
01071 
01072         dSlope = dSlopeNumerator / dSlopeDenomenator;
01073         dIntercept = (dSumY - (dSlope * dSumX)) / getXDimension();
01074         double dSxSq = (dSumXsq - (dSumXsq / getXDimension())) / (getXDimension() - 1);
01075         double dSySq = (dSumYsq - (dSumYsq / getXDimension())) / (getXDimension() - 1);
01076         dXCoefficient = dSlope * (sqrt(dSxSq) / sqrt(dSySq));
01077         return dSlope;
01078     }
01079 
01080     double normDifference()
01081     {
01082       SIZE iLength = getXDimension();
01083       double dSum = 0;
01084       for (SIZE iElementIndex = 0; (iElementIndex < iLength); iElementIndex++) {
01085           double dDiff = get(iElementIndex, 0) - get(iElementIndex, 1);
01086           dSum += dDiff * dDiff;
01087       }
01088       return sqrt(dSum);
01089     }
01090 };
